sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Bash-&bash-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, size diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ls, mv fileutils: rm gcc: cc grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: basename, echo, expr, uname textutils: cat, tr
